tips: Did you know you can see your Pokémon's stats in the Ankimon window?
You can battle other users' Pokémon by enabling the feature in the settings.
Running out of items? You can buy more in the Ankimon shop.
Your Pokémon gain experience every time you review your Anki cards.
You can customize your trainer sprite in the settings.
Check out the Ankimon leaderboard to see how you rank against other players!
You can export your Pokémon team to Pokémon Showdown format.
